mapper.select: SELECT A.*,NVL(B.CLOSINGPRICE,1000.0) AS CLOSINGPRICE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM/10 AS SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME,SUM(E.FMARKETVAL)*10000 AS FMARKETVAL,ROUND(SUM(F.ALISTEDSHARE),-2) AS ALISTEDSHARE,COUNT(1) AS STNUM FROM STK_SECTOR A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE JOIN CNT_INDUSTRY C ON A.SECTORNUM=C.INDUNUM AND C.INDULEVEL=1 JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SECUCODE,FMARKETVAL FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX WHERE TRADINGDAY=(SELECT MAX(TRADINGDAY) FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX))E ON A.SECUCODE=E.SECUCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMCODE,ALISTEDSHARE FROM COM_SHARECHANGE M WHERE ENDDATE=(SELECT MAX(ENDDATE) FROM COM_SHARECHANGE WHERE COMCODE=M.COMCODE AND ENDDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) )) F ON B.COMCODE=F.COMCODE WHERE A.SECTORSTANDARDCODE=15 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 AND B.EXCHANGECODE IN (101,105) GROUP BY D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME ORDER BY INDEXCODE) A LEFT JOIN TEMP_DJSZS B ON A.INDEXCODE=B.TRADINGCODE

SELECT A.*,NVL(B.CLOSINGPRICE,1000.0) AS CLOSINGPRICE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME,SUM(E.FMARKETVAL)*10000 AS FMARKETVAL,ROUND(SUM(F.ALISTEDSHARE),-2) AS ALISTEDSHARE,SUM(CASE WHEN B.SECUCODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS STNUM FROM STK_SECTOR A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE AND A.SECTORSTANDARDCODE=30 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SECUCODE,FMARKETVAL FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX WHERE TRADINGDAY=(SELECT MAX(TRADINGDAY) FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX))E ON A.SECUCODE=E.SECUCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMCODE,ALISTEDSHARE FROM COM_SHARECHANGE M WHERE ENDDATE=(SELECT MAX(ENDDATE) FROM COM_SHARECHANGE WHERE COMCODE=M.COMCODE AND ENDDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE))) F ON B.COMCODE=F.COMCODE GROUP BY D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME ORDER BY INDEXCODE) A LEFT JOIN TEMP_DJSZS B ON A.INDEXCODE=B.TRADINGCODE

SELECT A.*,NVL(B.CLOSINGPRICE,1000.0) AS CLOSINGPRICE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME,SUM(E.FMARKETVAL)*10000 AS FMARKETVAL,ROUND(SUM(F.ALISTEDSHARE),-2) AS ALISTEDSHARE,SUM(CASE WHEN B.SECUCODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS STNUM FROM STK_SECTOR_HOT A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SECUCODE,FMARKETVAL FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX WHERE TRADINGDAY=(SELECT MAX(TRADINGDAY) FROM STK_DAILYQUOTEINDEX))E ON A.SECUCODE=E.SECUCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT COMCODE,ALISTEDSHARE FROM COM_SHARECHANGE M WHERE ENDDATE=(SELECT MAX(ENDDATE) FROM COM_SHARECHANGE WHERE COMCODE=M.COMCODE AND ENDDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE))) F ON B.COMCODE=F.COMCODE GROUP BY D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME HAVING COUNT(1)<=4000/7 ORDER BY INDEXCODE) A LEFT JOIN TEMP_DJSZS B ON A.INDEXCODE=B.TRADINGCODE

SELECT INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SZCODE)) AS SZCODE ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SHCODE)) AS SHCODE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM/10 AS SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=101 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SHCODE, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=105 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SZCODE FROM STK_SECTOR A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE JOIN CNT_INDUSTRY C ON A.SECTORNUM=C.INDUNUM AND C.INDULEVEL=1 JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 WHERE A.SECTORSTANDARDCODE=15 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 AND B.EXCHANGECODE IN (101,105) ORDER BY D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME,B.TRADINGCODE )GROUP BY INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME union all SELECT INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SZCODE)) AS SZCODE ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SHCODE)) AS SHCODE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=101 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SHCODE, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=105 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SZCODE FROM STK_SECTOR A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE AND A.SECTORSTANDARDCODE=30 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 AND B.EXCHANGECODE IN (101,105) JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 ORDER BY D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME,B.TRADINGCODE )GROUP BY INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME union all SELECT INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SZCODE)) AS SZCODE ,TO_CHAR(WM_CONCAT(SHCODE)) AS SHCODE FROM ( SELECT D.INDEXCODE,D.SECTORNUM, D.SECTORNAME, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=101 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SHCODE, CASE WHEN B.EXCHANGECODE=105 THEN B.TRADINGCODE ELSE NULL END SZCODE FROM STK_SECTOR_HOT A JOIN STK_BASICINFO B ON A.SECUCODE=B.SECUCODE AND B.SECUCATEGORYCODEII=1001 AND A.ENDDATE IS NULL JOIN CNT_SECTOR_DJSBK D ON A.SECTORNUM=D.SECTORNUM AND D.STATUS=1 ORDER BY D.INDEXCODE,A.SECTORNUM, A.SECTORNAME,B.TRADINGCODE )GROUP BY INDEXCODE,SECTORNUM,SECTORNAME HAVING COUNT(1)<=4000/7
